definition: pillow/to pillow/to rest one's head on (Taiwan pr. [zhen4] for this sense)

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: This piece of cloth can be used to make a pair of pillow cases.
sentences.chinese: 这块布可以做一对枕套。

sentences.english: I made a snake bag out of a pillowcase, as Helen had instructed.
sentences.chinese: 我用枕套做了个蛇袋，就像海伦教我的那样。

sentences.english: The pillowcase openings must be facing each other in the middle of the bed.
sentences.chinese: 两个枕套的开口处要面向床的中间。

sentences.english: The clean part, which results from laundering your sheets and pillowcases, matters very much though.
sentences.chinese: 对于床单和枕套的清洗，是非常重要的一件事。

sentences.english: Mother is filling the ready-made pillowslip with cotton wool.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈正在往做好的枕套里充填棉絮。

sentences.english: Both the pillow core and pillow case are with great softness and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 无论枕芯还是枕套都是极柔软舒适的材料。

sentences.english: The pillow is filled with rice.
sentences.chinese: 这种枕套的枕芯是大米做的。

sentences.english: Does the Sona Pillow come with a pillowcase?
sentences.chinese: 舒鼾枕有专门的枕套吗？

sentences.english: We are glad that business for cotton pillowcases has been concluded .
sentences.chinese: 我们非常高兴有关棉布枕套的交易已经达成协议。

sentences.english: I put my pillow into my pillowcase.
sentences.chinese: 我把我的枕头放进枕套中。

sentences.english: Fold up your bedding, and change the pillowcase.
sentences.chinese: 整理好你的床铺，同时换一下枕套。

sentences.english: I put my pillow into the pillowcase .
sentences.chinese: 我把我的枕头放进枕套中。

sentences.english: American replaces its pillow cases during its overnight cleaning and removes soiled or damaged blankets.
sentences.chinese: 在当晚清晰的时候会更换枕套，和弄砸或破损的毯子。

sentences.english: Rinse invalid's pillowcases, sheets, towels and bedclothes.
sentences.chinese: 冲洗无效的枕套，床单，毛巾和床单。

sentences.english: I'm here to change the sheets and pillowcases.

definition: bare pillow (i.e. the pillow without pillow-case)
summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo)/CL:張|张[zhang1],領|领[ling3]
